text: Roger Meredith Harris was born 27 July, 1933 in Ōtāhuhu, Auckland, New Zealand. He was a New Zealand cricketer who played two tests in March 1959 and also played for Auckland in the Plunket Shield. ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Auckland
title: Roger Harris
